sentences.en: ...the gap between rich and poor.
sentences.cn: …贫富差距。

sentences.en: a gap in a hedge
sentences.cn: 树篱的豁口

sentences.en: a gap in the traffic
sentences.cn: 车流中的一个空档

sentences.en: a movie that is sure to bridge the generation gap
sentences.cn: 肯定能弥合代沟的一部电影

sentences.en: Britain needs to bridge the technology gap between academia and industry.
sentences.cn: 英国需要弥合学术界和企业界之间的技术差距。

sentences.en: By 1973, this gap had narrowed almost to vanishing point.
sentences.cn: 到1973年，这一差距已缩小到几乎为零。

sentences.en: For too long there was a huge gap in the market.
sentences.cn: 长久以来，市场有一块巨大的空白。

sentences.en: Frank’s death has left a big gap in my life.
sentences.cn: 弗兰克的去世给我的生活留下一大片空白。

sentences.en: He flashed his headlights and jumped lanes whenever a gap opened up.
sentences.cn: 只要前面出现一点空隙他就会亮起前车灯并超车.

sentences.en: He helped us to fill in a big gap in our knowledge.
sentences.cn: 他帮我们填满知识上的空白.

sentences.en: I went around the world in my gap year.
sentences.cn: 我在上大学前空闲的一年里周游了世界。

sentences.en: The gap between the now knowable and unknowable is vast.
sentences.cn: 现已知与未知之事间的距离极大.

sentences.en: the gap between the two rows of seats
sentences.cn: 两排座位之间的间隔

sentences.en: The sheep got into the field through a gap in the hedge.
sentences.cn: 羊群从树篱的缺口跑向田野.

sentences.en: The trade gap between imports and exports remained high.
sentences.cn: 进出口贸易差额依然很大.

sentences.en: the widening gap between the rich and the poor
sentences.cn: 越来越大的贫富差距

sentences.en: There followed a gap of four years, during which William joined the Army.
sentences.cn: 之后有4年的间隔，期间威廉参军了。

sentences.en: There is a credibility gap developing between employers and employees.
sentences.cn: 雇主和雇员之间出现了信任危机。

sentences.en: There is a gap of five miles between towns.
sentences.cn: 镇与镇之间相隔五英里.

sentences.en: There is a wide gap between the views of the two statesmen.
sentences.cn: 关于这点,两位政治家的政见有很大分歧.

sentences.en: There was only a narrow gap between the bed and the wall.
sentences.cn: 床和墙之间只有一条窄缝。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 代沟（两代人之间的隔阂）
信息沟；信息差；信息差距
v. 弥补缺陷；填补空白

trans.tran_en: a space between two objects or two parts of an object, especially because something is missing
